summary: Meeting minutes from a security meeting at MCC New York discussing funding for additional security measures including mirrors and surveillance cameras, particularly in high-risk areas like the hallway of Unit 2. The document indicates a camera survey has been completed and decisions on funding are pending.

events.title: MCC New York Security Meeting
events.description: Security meeting held at MCC New York to discuss funding for added security measures including mirrors and surveillance cameras in security-risk areas.

keyFacts: MCC New York has available funding for added security measures as of April 2017.
Funding was intended for mirrors and surveillance cameras in security-risk areas like the hallway of Unit 2.
A camera survey had been completed by the time of the meeting.
The Central Office decision on funding was still pending.
The document shows internal prison security discussions unrelated to specific individuals in the Epstein case.
